TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ArcSegment extends System.Windows.Media.PathSegment
Public NotInheritable Class ArcSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class ArcSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示兩個點之間的橢圓形弧線。

span.span: Represents an elliptical arc between two points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用儲存物件物件和其他區段。Use a object to store objects and other segments. 由其開始和結束點，而 x 和 y 半徑，x 軸旋轉的因素，值，指出弧形是否應大於 180 度，以及描述用來繪製弧形方向的值所定義的橢圓形弧線。An elliptical arc is defined by its start and end points, x- and y-radius, x-axis rotation factor, a value indicating whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees, and a value describing the direction in which the arc is drawn. 類別不包含弧線的起點的內容，只會定義它所代表之弧線的目的地點。The class does not contain a property for the starting point of the arc; it only defines the destination point of the arc it represents. 弧線的起點是目前的點的加入。The beginning point of the arc is the current point of the to which the is added. 下圖示範不同的結束點， ，和設定。The following illustrations demonstrate the different end point, , and settings. ![具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") ![具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") ![具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") ## IsLargeArc 和 SweepDirectionIsLargeArc and SweepDirection 大多數的特定位置、 大小和輪替弧形，有四個不同弧形可以繪製。和屬性會指出要使用哪些弧線。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 其餘的兩個弧形候選項目每個繪製以不同的方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 屬性會指定要使用哪一個。The property specifies which one to use. 下圖顯示不同和設定。The following illustrations show different and settings. ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") 具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 ArcSegment 物件ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ![具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") 具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 ArcSegment 物件ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 是一種物件。An is a type of object. 如需有關資訊功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點至其加入。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 對於最橢圓形弧線的特定位置、 大小和輪替有四個不同弧線要繪製;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`參數指出要使用哪些弧線。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果`largeArc`是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，以正角方向繪製弧形。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，以負角方向繪製弧形。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點至其加入。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 對於最橢圓形弧線的特定位置、 大小和輪替有四個不同弧線要繪製;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`參數指出要使用哪些弧線。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果`largeArc`是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，以正角方向繪製弧形。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，以負角方向繪製弧形。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

MemberSignature.Value: public ArcSegment (System.Windows.Point point, System.Windows.Size size, double rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Point point, valuetype System.Windows.Size size, float64 rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, valuetype System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked) cil managed
public: ArcSegment(System::Windows::Point point, System::Windows::Size size, double rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked);

param.name: point
param.span: 弧線的終點。弧線的起點定義為加入了 的 目前的點。

span.span: The destination point of the arc; the start point of the arc is defined as the current point of the to which the is added.

param.name: size
param.span: 弧線的半徑 X 和 Y。 結構的 屬性指定半徑 X， 結構的 屬性指定半徑 Y。

span.span: The x- and y-radius of the arc. The x-radius is specified by the structure's property, and the y-radius is specified by the structure's property.

param.name: rotationAngle
param.span: 橢圓形繞 X 軸旋轉。

span.span: The x-axis rotation of the ellipse.

param.name: isLargeArc
param.span: 弧線是否應該大於 180 度。

span.span: Whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.

param.name: sweepDirection
param.span: 設為 以正角方向繪製弧線，設為 以負角方向繪製弧線。

span.span: Set to to draw the arc in a positive angle direction; set to to draw the arc in a negative angle direction.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 用 呈現區段時，設為 true 繪製弧線；否則為 false。

span.span: Set to true to stroke the arc when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, false.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點至其加入。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 對於最橢圓形弧線的特定位置、 大小和輪替有四個不同弧線要繪製;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`參數指出要使用哪些弧線。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果`largeArc`是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，以正角方向繪製弧形。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，以負角方向繪製弧形。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

summary.span: 建立這個 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

public: property bool IsLargeArc { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出弧形是否應大於 180 度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.

value.span: **true**如果弧形應大於 180 度，否則**false**。

span.span: **true** if the arc should be greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, **false**.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多數的特定位置、 大小和輪替弧形，有四個不同弧形可以繪製。和屬性會指出要使用哪些弧線。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 其餘的兩個弧形候選項目每個繪製以不同的方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 屬性會指定要使用哪一個。The property specifies which one to use. 下圖顯示完全相同，除了兩個橢圓形弧線其設定。The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") 具有不同 IsLargeArc 設定的 ArcSegment 物件ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Point Point { System::Windows::Point get(); void set(System::Windows::Point value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定橢圓形弧線的端點。

span.span: Gets or sets the endpoint of the elliptical arc.
The point to which the arc is drawn.
The default value is (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會定義只弧線它所代表的目的地點; 弧線的起點是目前的點的加入。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the to which the is added. 如果圓弧線段的起點和終點是相同的就會不繪製任何弧形。If the arc segment's start point and end point are the same, no arc is drawn. 大多數的特定位置、 大小和輪替弧形，有四個不同弧形可以繪製。和屬性會指出要使用哪些弧線。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四個可能的弧形曲線，兩個代表大型弧形 180 度或更多，而且兩個代表小弧形掃掠 180 度或更少。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，則兩個較大的弧形掃掠的其中一個是選擇; 否則如果是**false**，下列其中一個選擇較小弧線的掃掠。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 其餘的兩個弧形候選項目每個繪製以不同的方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 屬性會指定要使用哪一個。The property specifies which one to use. 下圖顯示完全相同，除了的數個橢圓形弧線其設定。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") 數個具有不同 Point 設定的 ArcSegment 物件Several ArcSegment objects with different Point settings ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double RotationAngle { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定橢圓形繞著 X 軸旋轉的量 (以度為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.

value.span: 橢圓形繞著 X 軸旋轉的量 (以度為單位)。

span.span: The amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示完全相同，除了的數個橢圓形弧線其設定。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") 數個具有不同 RotationAngle 設定的 ArcSegment 物件Several ArcSegment objects with different RotationAngle settings 請注意，是否弧線的寬度和高度都相同，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。Note that, if the arc's width and height are the same, setting this property has no effect. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Size Size { System::Windows::Size get(); void set(System::Windows::Size value); };

summary.span: 以 結構取得或設定弧形的 X 半徑和 Y 半徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the x- and y-radius of the arc as a structure.

value.span: A結構描述橢圓形弧線 x 和 y 半徑。結構的屬性指定弧線的 x 軸半徑，其屬性指定弧線的 y 半徑。

span.span: A structure that describes the x- and y-radius of the elliptical arc. The structure's property specifies the arc's x-radius; its property specifies the arc's y-radius.
The default value is 0,0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示完全相同，除了的數個橢圓形弧線其設定。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "具有不同 Size 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") 數個具有不同 Size 設定的 ArcSegment 物件Several ArcSegment objects with different Size settings ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection SweepDirection { System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定是以 或 方向繪製弧形。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the arc is drawn in the or direction.

value.span: 指定繪製弧形方向的值。

span.span: A value that specifies the direction in which the arc is drawn.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如與給定， ，開始點和結束，可能會有四個不同的弧形。For an with a given , , start point, and end , four different arcs are possible. 指定屬性減少可能都有兩個： 結尾從起始點繪製弧形中方向和結束點，在從起始點繪製弧形方向。Specifying the property reduces the number of possible arcs to two: an arc drawn from the start point to the end in a direction and an arc drawn from the start point to the end point in a direction. 下圖顯示完全相同，除了兩個橢圓形弧線其設定。The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") 具有不同 SweepDirection 設定的 ArcSegment 物件ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SweepDirectionProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly SweepDirectionProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
